name: NumberFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask number facts for a fact about three.”
”tell me about eighty-seven.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number facts
des: Learn interesting facts about specific numbers, like 42 or 99. Just say "Alexa, ask number facts for a fact about 3". You can hear more facts about the same number, or ask about a new number. Best on a device with a screen!
